where 1 = 1
u.user_id = #userId#
u.user_id like concat('%', #userId#, '%')
u.manager_id = #managerId#
u.role_id = #roleId#
u.role_id in #roles[]#
u.status in #statuses[]#
u.email = #email#
r.type not in #notInRoleType[]#
u.update_time >= concat(#beginTime#, ' 00:00:00')

sqlMap.insert: insert into user ( user_id, role_id, password, email, true_name, phone, job, open_sms, rand_code, moderate, status, manager_id, create_time, update_time, expire_time, permission_id ) values ( #userId#, #roleId#, #password#, #email#, #trueName#, #phone#, #job#, #openSms#, #randCode#, #moderate#, #status#, #managerId#, now(), now(), null, #permissionId# )
sqlMap.update: update user u set u.role_id = #roleId#, u.password = #password#, u.email = #email#, u.true_name = #trueName#, u.phone = #phone#, u.job = #job#, u.open_sms = #openSms#, u.rand_code = #randCode#, u.moderate = #moderate#, u.status = #status#, u.manager_id = #managerId#, u.update_time = now(), u.expire_time = #expireTime#, u.permission_id = #permissionId# where u.user_id = #userId#

select
